sentence.Network_en: His most prized time, though, will be spent quietly on his farm.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过，他最宝贵的时光将在自己的农场里平静地度过。

sentence.Network_en: Quietly Mark poured and served drinks for all of them.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克一声不响地给他们每人倒好饮料并端上来。

sentence.Network_en: A lady always sits quietly with her hands in her lap.
sentence.Network_cn: 淑女端坐时总是双手放在膝上，不发一言。

entry.tran: 轻声的;安静的；静悄悄的
entry.def: Someone or something that is quiet makes only a small amount of noise.

example.ex: Tania kept the children reasonably quiet and contented...
example.tran: 塔妮娅把孩子们哄得安安静静而又心满意足。

example.ex: A quiet murmur passed through the classroom...
example.tran: 一阵悄悄的低语声传遍了整个教室。

entry.def: If a place is quiet, there is very little noise there.

example.ex: She was received in a small, quiet office...
example.tran: 她在一个安静的小办公室里受到接待。

example.ex: The street was unnaturally quiet.
example.tran: 街上安静得有些异常。

entry.tran: (地方、环境、时光)安宁的，清静的，平静的，宁静的
entry.def: If a place, situation, or time is quiet, there is no excitement, activity, or trouble.

example.ex: ...a quiet rural backwater...
example.tran: 平静而与世隔绝的农村地区

example.ex: It is very quiet without him...
example.tran: 他不在的时候这里非常清静。

example.ex: He called for quiet and announced that the next song was in our honor...
example.tran: 他叫大家安静，然后宣布下一首歌要送给我们。

example.ex: Jeremy wants some peace and quiet before his big match.
example.tran: 杰里米希望在大赛来临之前能享受到些许平静和安宁。

entry.tran: 沉默的；不出声的;一言不发的
entry.def: If you are quiet, you are not saying anything.

example.ex: I told them to be quiet and go to sleep...
example.tran: 我叫他们不要说话，马上睡觉。

example.ex: I just went quiet, embarrassed, and couldn't answer...
example.tran: 我一下子收了声，红了脸，答不出话来。

entry.tran: (感情)不外露的，不张扬的，内敛的，含蓄的
entry.def: If you refer, for example, to someone's quiet confidence or quiet despair, you mean that they do not say much about the way they are feeling.

example.ex: He has a quiet confidence in his ability...
example.tran: 他对自己胸有成竹，但却并不张扬。

example.ex: All through his life he has shown a quiet determination to get things done.
example.tran: 他一生都在默默而坚定地做事。

entry.def: You describe activities as quiet when they happen in secret or in such a way that people do not notice them.

example.ex: The Swedes had sought his freedom through quiet diplomacy...
example.tran: 瑞典人通过秘密的外交手段来争取他的自由。

example.ex: Then it was back to the house for a quiet celebration...
example.tran: 然后就回到房子里悄悄地庆祝一番。

entry.tran: 温和的;文静的;不易激动(或动怒)的
entry.def: A quiet person behaves in a calm way and is not easily made angry or upset.

example.ex: He's a nice quiet man.
example.tran: 他是一个温和友善的人。

entry.tran: (颜色、服饰)素净的，朴素大方的
entry.def: You describe colours or clothes as quiet when they are not bright or not very noticeable.

example.ex: They dress in quiet colors so as not to call attention to themselves.
example.tran: 为了避免别人注目，他们穿得很朴素。

entry.def: If someone or something quiets or if you quiet them, they become less noisy, less active, or silent.

example.ex: The wind dropped and the sea quieted...
example.tran: 风势减弱了，海面平静下来。

example.ex: Estela started to say something but a gesture from her husband quieted her at once.
example.tran: 埃丝特拉正要说些什么，但是看到丈夫的一个手势，马上就不说话了。

entry.tran: 消除，减轻(恐惧);平息(抱怨)
entry.def: To quiet fears or complaints means to persuade people that there is no good reason for them.

example.ex: Music seemed to quiet her anxiety and loneliness.
example.tran: 音乐似乎能够减轻她的焦虑和孤独。

entry.def: If someone does not go quietly, they do not leave a particular job or a place without complaining or resisting.

example.ex: She's not going to go quietly.
example.tran: 她不会乖乖离开的。

entry.def: If you keep quiet about something or keep something quiet, you do not say anything about it.

example.ex: I told her to keep quiet about it...
example.tran: 我告诉她此事要保密。

example.ex: I think I found it easier than Nell to keep our engagement quiet.
example.tran: 我觉得，我比内尔更容易守得住我们订婚的秘密。

entry.def: If something is done on the quiet, it is done secretly or in such a way that people do not notice it.

example.ex: She'd promised to give him driving lessons, on the quiet, when no one could see.
example.tran: 她已经保证要在别人看不见的时候私下教他开车。

sentences.sentence: "speak softly but carry a big stick"
"the class was listening quietly and intently"

means.word_mean: 3. with little or no activity or no agitation (`quiet' is a nonstandard variant for `quietly');

sentences.sentence: "her hands rested quietly in her lap"
"the rock star was quietly led out the back door"
"sit here as quiet as you can"
"the streets are restfully sunny and still for the town is at mass"

auth_sentence.content: Well, spank us quietly with a chamois leather!
auth_sentence.res_content: Well, spank us quietly with a chamois leather!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well, spank us quietly with a chamois leather!

auth_sentence.content: I sat quietly and let them pour everything in.
auth_sentence.res_content: I sat quietly and let them pour everything in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I sat quietly and let them pour everything in.

auth_sentence.content: They find new hosts in which to quietly mutate.
auth_sentence.res_content: They find new hosts in which to quietly mutate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They find new hosts in which to quietly mutate.

Sentence.sentence: Surviving the Recession America's recession began quietly at the end of
He also famously remarked that all of man's problems come from his inability to sit quietly in a room alone.

sentences.en: Even the union leaders hoped that the strike would die quietly.
sentences.cn: 甚至连工会领袖们都希望罢工会无声无息地结束。

sentences.en: She closed the door very quietly,as she was afraid of wakening her baby.
sentences.cn: 她害怕把小宝宝惊醒,所以关门的动作很轻。

sentences.en: Benson signaled the auctioneer quietly and kicked the bid up another thousand dollars.
sentences.cn: 本森悄悄地向拍卖人做了个手势,然后把出价又抬高了1000美元。

sentences.en: Everyone was too busy laughing themselves silly to notice her quietly leave the room.
sentences.cn: 大家都在疯狂地大笑,没有注意到她悄悄离开了房间。

means.word_mean: 平静地;文静地;温和地；朴素地

sentences.en: He came out of the interview feeling quietly confident.
sentences.cn: 他面试后走出来， 感觉平静而自信。

means.word_mean: 在暗中,秘密地;不张扬地

sentences.en: He has been quietly dropped from the England team.
sentences.cn: 他被暗地里从英格兰队中除名了。

sentences.en: He was not vain, but he was quietly proud of his literary achievements.
sentences.cn: 他并不自负，但暗地里却为自己取得的文学成就而得意。
